doc:
Valerie Wellington https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Valerie_Wellington 0 Valerie Wellington (November 14, 1959 – January 2, 1993) was an African-American singer who, in her short career, switched from singing opera to singing Chicago blues and electric blues. On her 1984 album, Million Dollar $ecret, she worked with Sunnyland Slim, Billy Branch, and Magic Slim. She also worked with Lee "Shot" Williams. Valerie_Wellington ( November_14_,_1959 – January_2_,_1993 ) was an_African-American_singer who , in her_short_career , switched from singing_opera to singing_Chicago_blues and electric_blues . On her_1984_album , Million_Dollar_$_ecret , she worked with Sunnyland_Slim , Billy_Branch , and Magic_Slim . She also worked with Lee_"_Shot_"_Williams .
